response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and the value it brings to you, we believe it's worth $15,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and considering your financial situation, I am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity not to be missed. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
